location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: there is a foliation sequence, which is circled in pencil, in the top right corner of the recto of each folio. It begins on the front cover, on number 1, and ends on the inside of the back cover, on number 14. There is an original pagination, from 4-24.

mods.abstract: This volume contains geographical, social and economic information on Arabia and was produced by the Naval Staff Intelligence Department, June 1919.It is divided into two sections: 'Geography'(folios 3-8) and 'Man' including 'Race, Language and Religion', 'Manners and Custom', 'Economic Capacity of Inhabitants' and 'Distribution and Density of Population' (folios 8v-13).
